item.title: CSS Grid Layout
item.description: CSS Grid Layout is great for creating a responsive web page layout. We can also define an area by giving it a name and then specify the location of that area in the value of the grid-template-areas property, such as: header footer sidebar content The grid-area property can be assigned to a class: .header { grid-area: hd; } .footer { grid-area: ft; } .content { grid-area: main; } .
